title: Need Help and Explanation, my account got banned without my presences
body: Hi, hopefully this will get to riot.... I left my account untouched for a year because i went settle in a different country... now i have finally download it in my computer/ found internet cafe that has north america server, i log in and its said: "This account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated with your League of Legends account for additional details." i have no idea what happened... i checked my match history and it seems like someone else have been using my account like straight 3 days all URF AR mode... which i knew myself i haven't played my account for a year... riot, as i changed my account password now, please bring back my account {{sticker:sg-soraka}} .. i loved playing League of Legends and judging my records.. i am sportsmanship... please consider.... i have been building this account like for 5 years now.....

replies.body: If you feel like someone else was using your account and they were the ones who got it banned, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can. You'll be able to verify that you were the one who created the account by answering some basic questions about the account, and after that they should be able to look over what happened and set things right.
thanks bro... i will be waiting for riot's reply then.... {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
